properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 15 at 12:59PM PST until January 17 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Hanford CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected above 4000 feet. Total snow accumulations
of up to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph.

* WHERE...Fort Tejon area, including Interstate 5 through the
Grapevine.

* WHEN...From 4 PM Thursday to 4 AM PST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous
conditions could impact the evening commute. Gusty winds could
bring down tree branches.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The majority of snow will fall Thursday
evening.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THURSDAY TO 4 AM PST FRIDAY ABOVE 4000 FEET
